posts.post_title: FS: 1887 Buchner Gold Coin Big Sam Thompson HOF 275.00
posts.post_content:
Nice card possibly trimmed (but I don't think so) and the back has issues but it still displays well. The price is 275.00 paypal no fees please. Thanks for looking and Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!!!

Joe K
